gov.nasa.worldwind.event

Class DragSelectEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • gov.nasa.worldwind.event.WWEvent
        • gov.nasa.worldwind.event.SelectEvent
          • gov.nasa.worldwind.event.DragSelectEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DragSelectEvent
extends SelectEvent
    This class is a specialization of SelectEvent and includes the pick point screen position of the most recent drag event prior to the current one.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
